import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProductService from '../../../service/product.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import EditProductForm from '../product-form/EditProductForm' import './ProductDetails.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class ProductDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { modalShow: false, } this.productService = new ProductService() } handleModal = visible => this.setState({ modalShow: visible }) hideModal = () => this.setState({ modalShow : false}) getProductInfo = () => { const id = this.props.match.params.productId this.productService.getProduct(id) .then(response => this.setState(response.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getProductInfo() } finishProductPost = () => { this.handleModal(false) this.getProductInfo() } render() { return ( this.handleModal(false)}> this.handleModal(false)}/>

{this.state.name}

Products { this.props.loggedInUser && this.props.loggedInUser.role === "ADMIN" && <> } { this.props.loggedInUser && this.props.loggedInUser.role === "CLIENT" && <> }

D · e · t · a · i · l · s

  • Category: {this.state.category}
  • Price: {this.state.price}
  • Description: This is one of the most popular types of bags, thanks to its modern, elegant and functional design. The distinctive feature of this bag is a long strap that allows girls to hang it comfortably on their shoulder or simply carry it across. Regarding its size, it is generally available in medium size and in many cases it can include metallic details and a personalized interior.
 ) } } export default ProductDetails
